title: Cognitive Load Management Strategies: Project-Based Social Analysis Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science research methodologies and experience using data analysis tools
context.additional_context: Environment utilizing individual devices per learner and real-time collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three cognitive load factors when performing project tasks.
Learners can systematically process complex social science analysis tasks by applying task-division strategies.
Learners can improve information processing efficiency by at least 20% using visual aids (such as infographics).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
